thread.title: Visteon to Present at Baird 2015 Industrial Conference on Nov. 11, and Barclays Global Automotive Conference on Nov. 18
thread.title_full: Visteon to Present at Baird 2015 Industrial Conference on Nov. 11, and Barclays Global Automotive Conference on Nov. 18

author: admin
title: Visteon to Present at Baird 2015 Industrial Conference on Nov. 11, and Barclays Global Automotive Conference on Nov. 18
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/20/2015 @ 1:05 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Visteon 
VAN BUREN TOWNSHIP, Mich., Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Visteon Corporation (NYSE: VC) is scheduled to present at two upcoming investor conferences: the Baird 2015 Industrial Conference in Chicago and the Barclays Global Automotive Conference in New York. The scheduled times of Visteon's presentations, including question-and-answer sessions, are: 
Baird 2015 Industrial Conference, Chicago - Wednesday, Nov. 11, from 7:30-7:55 a.m. ET. 
Barclays Global Automotive Conference, New York - Wednesday, Nov. 18, from 1:25-2:15 p.m. ET. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20001201/DEF008LOGO 
Sachin Lawande, president and CEO, and Jeffrey M. Stafeil, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will provide an overview of the company's strategy, financial profile and related matters. A live listen-only webcast, along with the presentation material and other supplemental information, will be accessible through Visteon's website at www.visteon.com/presentations . A replay will be available following each event. 
About Visteon 
Visteon is a global company that designs, engineers and manufactures innovative cockpit electronics products and connected car solutions for most of the world's major vehicle manufacturers. Visteon is a leading provider of driver information and controls, audio and infotainment, and domain controllers; its brands include Lightscape®, OpenAir® and SmartCore(TM). With corporate offices in Van Buren Township, Michigan, (U.S.); Shanghai, China; and Chelmsford, UK; Visteon has more than 11,000 employees at 50 facilities in 21 countries. Visteon had sales of $2.6 billion in 2014. Learn more at www.visteon.com .
